CheersSettings.showQaplaChallengeProgress: Choose whether show or not the progress of your Qlan in the Qapla Challenge
CheersSettings.title: Receive messages from your community
CheersSettings.description: Show the messages of the cheers that your community sends you in your streams by adding this link into your OBS.

instruction0.title: How do I add Qapla cheer alerts to my OBS?
instruction0.description: It is too easy! It works just like the alerts you already know and you like to show so much in your streams :).
instruction0.descriptionBold: Follow the simple instructions below to add them.

instruction1.title: 1. Open your OBS setup
instruction1.description: Go to your OBS (StreamLabs, OBS, Stream Elements, etc.) and open the setup that you use regularly to stream.

instruction2.title: 2. Add a source to your screen in your OBS

instruction3.title: 3. Select Browser Source from the sources menu

instruction5.title: 5. Copy paste your custom Qapla URL.
instruction5.description: Go to Source > Options. Define width to 1920 and height to 1080. Uncheck all other options

instruction6.title: 6. Test your Qapla cheer alerts
instruction6.description: Press the button to send a fake message in order to check if everything is working

CheersSettings.testCheerError: There was an error sending the test message, try again, if the error persists contact technical support
CheersSettings.testCheerSuccess: Test Cheer sent succesfuly! It will be shown in your OBS in a few seconds

OnBoarding.body1: Welcome to your Qapla profile 😍. Connect with more members of the community by enabling your profile
OnBoarding.body2: Share what you like, what your content is about, or whatever you want!, to increase the chances of matching with the people who come by your stream 💜
OnBoarding.body3: Drive valuable traffic to all your online content. One place for your schedule streams and your communication channels 🎙
OnBoarding.addTags: Add tags that represent you as the creator, your persona, your content, etc.
OnBoarding.yourIntro: Your intro is a glimpse of yourself and your content. Make it nice 😉
OnBoarding.tagErrorNotSelected: To add a tag write and/or click on it
OnBoarding.minTags: Add at least {{minTags}} tags to continue

EditStream.changeDesc: Participants and your followers will be notified of any changes. We recommend not changing the date and time very often, the consistency in your publications generates more to your streams.
EditStream.sendMessageDesc: Notify your people about something relevant in your stream, create hype or whatever you want! Participants and your followers will receive a mobile notification with your message.
